title: Table Cover, 1890
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: stem, running, satin and knot stitches on plain weave; deflected element border; bobbin lace border
dimensions: H x W: 160 x 59 cm (5 ft. 3 in. x 23 1/4 in.)
description: Seventeen embroidered gnomes walking on vines and leaves. Each carrying a different fruit, vegetable or objects such as: radishes, grapes, a wine cup, foaming beer mug, sausage, egg, carrots or turnips, cherries, wheat, mushrooms, strawberries, raspberries, lobster, and a barrel of wine dated 1890.

tombstone.epitaph:
Table Cover, 1890.Medium: silk on linen
Technique: stem, running, satin and knot stitches on plain weave; deflected element border; bobbin lace border. 1983-25-1.
